00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 use WeBWorK::HTML::ScrollingRecordList qw/scrollingRecordList/;
00032 #use WeBWorK::Utils::FilterRecords qw/getFiltersForClass/;
00033 
00034 use constant E_NO_USERS     => "Please do not select any users.";
00035 use constant E_NO_SETS      => "Please do not select any sets.";
00036 use constant E_MAX_ONE_USER => "Please select at most one user.";
00037 use constant E_MAX_ONE_SET  => "Please select at most one set.";
00038 use constant E_ONE_USER     => "Please select exactly one user.";
00039 use constant E_ONE_SET      => "Please select exactly one set.";
00040 use constant E_MIN_ONE_USER => "Please select at least one user.";
00041 use constant E_MIN_ONE_SET  => "Please select at least one set.";
00042 use constant E_SET_NAME     => "Please specify a homework set name.";
00043 use constant E_BAD_NAME     => "Please use only letter, digits, -, _ and . in your set name.";
00044 
00045 sub pre_header_initialize {
00046     my ($self) = @_;
00047     my $r = $self->r;
00048     my $ce = $r->ce;
00049     my $db = $r->db;
00050     my $authz = $r->authz;
00051     my $urlpath = $r->urlpath;
00052 
00053     my $courseID = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00054     my $userID = $r->param("user");
00055     my $eUserID = $r->param("effectiveUser");
00056     $self->{courseName} = $courseID;
00057     # Check permissions
00058     return unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userID, "access_instructor_tools"));
00059     
00060     my @selectedUserIDs = $r->param("selected_users");
00061     my @selectedSetIDs = $r->param("selected_sets");
00062     
00063     my $nusers = @selectedUserIDs;
00064     my $nsets = @selectedSetIDs;
00065     
00066     my $firstUserID = $nusers ? $selectedUserIDs[0] : "";
00067     my $firstSetID = $nsets ? $selectedSetIDs[0] : "";
00068     
00069     # these will be used to construct a new URL
00070     my $module;
00071     my %args = ( courseID => $courseID );
00072     my %params;
00073     
00074     my $pfx = "WeBWorK::ContentGenerator";
00075     my $ipfx = "WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor";
00076     
00077     my @error;
00078     
00079     # depending on which button was pushed, fill values in for URL construction
00080     
00081     defined param $r "sets_assigned_to_user" and do {
00082         if ($nusers == 1) {
00083             $module = "${ipfx}::UserDetail";
00084             $args{userID} = $firstUserID;
00085             $params{fromTools} = 1;
00086         } else {
00087             push @error, E_ONE_USER;
00088         }
00089     };
00090     
00091     defined param $r "users_assigned_to_set" and do {
00092         if ($nsets == 1) {
00093             $module = "${ipfx}::UsersAssignedToSet";
00094             $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00095             $params{fromTools} = 1;
00096         } else {
00097             push @error, E_ONE_SET;
00098         }
00099     };
00100     
00101     defined param $r "edit_users" and do {
00102         if ($nusers >= 1) {
00103             $module = "${ipfx}::UserList2";
00104             $params{visible_users} = \@selectedUserIDs;
00105             $params{editMode} = 1;
00106         } else {
00107             push @error, E_MIN_ONE_USER;
00108         }
00109     };
00110     
00111     defined param $r "edit_sets" and do {
00112         if ($nsets == 1) {
00113             $module = "${ipfx}::ProblemSetDetail";
00114             $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00115         } else {
00116             push @error, E_ONE_SET;
00117             
00118         }
00119     };
00120     
00121     defined param $r "prob_lib" and do {
00122         if ($nsets == 1) {
00123                     $module = "${ipfx}::SetMaker";
00124             $params{local_sets} = $firstSetID;
00125         } elsif ($nsets == 0) {
00126                 $module = "${ipfx}::SetMaker";
00127         } else {
00128             push @error, E_ONE_SET;
00129             
00130         }
00131     };
00132     
00133     defined param $r "user_stats" and do {
00134         if ($nusers == 1) {
00135             $module = "${ipfx}::Stats";
00136             $args{statType} = "student"; # FIXME: fix URLPath -- i shouldn't have to type this!
00137             $args{userID} = $firstUserID;
00138         } else {
00139             push @error, E_ONE_USER;
00140         }
00141     };
00142     
00143     defined param $r "set_stats" and do {
00144         if ($nsets == 1) {
00145             $module = "${ipfx}::Stats";
00146             $args{statType} = "set"; # FIXME: fix URLPath -- i shouldn't have to type this!
00147             $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00148         } else {
00149             push @error, E_ONE_SET;
00150         }
00151     };
00152     
00153     defined param $r "user_progress" and do {
00154         if ($nusers == 1) {
00155             $module = "${ipfx}::StudentProgress";
00156             $args{statType} = "student"; # FIXME: fix URLPath -- i shouldn't have to type this!
00157             $args{userID} = $firstUserID;
00158         } else {
00159             push @error, E_ONE_USER;
00160         }
00161     };
00162     
00163     defined param $r "set_progress" and do {
00164         if ($nsets == 1) {
00165             $module = "${ipfx}::StudentProgress";
00166             $args{statType} = "set"; # FIXME: fix URLPath -- i shouldn't have to type this!
00167             $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00168         } else {
00169             push @error, E_ONE_SET;
00170         }
00171     };
00172     
00173     defined param $r "user_options" and do {
00174         if ($nusers == 1) {
00175             $module = "${pfx}::Options";
00176             $params{effectiveUser} = $firstUserID;
00177         } else {
00178             push @error, E_ONE_USER;
00179         }
00180     };
00181     
00182     defined param $r "score_sets" and do {
00183         if ($nsets >= 1) {
00184             $module = "${ipfx}::Scoring";
00185             $params{selectedSet} = \@selectedSetIDs;
00186             $params{scoreSelected} = 1;
00187         } else {
00188             push @error, E_MIN_ONE_SET;
00189         }
00190     };
00191     
00192     defined param $r "assign_users" and do {
00193         if ($nusers >= 1 and $nsets >= 1) {
00194             $module = "${ipfx}::Assigner";
00195             $params{selected_users} = \@selectedUserIDs;
00196             $params{selected_sets} = \@selectedSetIDs;
00197             $params{assign} = "Assign selected sets to selected users";
00198         } else {
00199             push @error, E_MIN_ONE_USER unless $nusers >= 1;
00200             push @error, E_MIN_ONE_SET unless $nsets >= 1;
00201         }
00202     };
00203     
00204     defined param $r "act_as_user" and do {
00205         if ($nusers == 1 and $nsets <= 1) {
00206             if ($nsets) {
00207                 # unfortunately, we need to know what
00208                 #    type of set it is to figure out
00209                 #    the correct module
00210                 my $set = $db->getGlobalSet( $firstSetID );
00211                 if ( defined( $set ) &&
00212                      $set->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ ) {
00213                     $module = "${pfx}::GatewayQuiz";
00214                 } else {
00215                     $module = "${pfx}::ProblemSet";
00216                 }
00217                 $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00218             } else {
00219                 $module = "${pfx}::ProblemSets";
00220             }
00221             $params{effectiveUser} = $firstUserID;
00222         } else {
00223             push @error, E_ONE_USER unless $nusers == 1;
00224             push @error, E_MAX_ONE_SET unless $nsets <= 1;
00225         }
00226     };
00227     
00228     defined param $r "edit_set_for_users" and do {
00229         if ($nusers >= 1 and $nsets == 1) {
00230             $module = "${ipfx}::ProblemSetDetail";
00231             $args{setID} = $firstSetID;
00232             $params{editForUser} = \@selectedUserIDs;
00233         } else {
00234             push @error, E_MIN_ONE_USER unless $nusers >= 1;
00235             push @error, E_ONE_SET unless $nsets == 1;
00236             
00237         }
00238     };
00239     
00240     defined param $r "create_set" and do {
00241       my $setname = $r->param("new_set_name");
00242       if ($setname && $setname ne 'Name for new set here') {
00243         if ($setname =~ /^[\w.-]*$/) {
00244         $module = "${ipfx}::SetMaker";
00245         $params{new_local_set} = "Create a New Set in this Course";
00246         $params{new_set_name} = $setname;
00247         $params{selfassign} = 1;
00248           } else {
00249         push @error, E_BAD_NAME;
00250           }
00251       } else {
00252         push @error, E_SET_NAME;
00253       }
00254     };
00255 
00256     defined param $r "add_users" and do {
00257         $module = "${ipfx}::AddUsers";
00258     };
00259 
00260     defined param $r "email_users" and do {
00261         $module = "${ipfx}::SendMail";
00262     };
00263 
00264     defined param $r "transfer_files" and do {
00265         $module = "${ipfx}::FileManager";
00266     };
00267 
00268     push @error, "You are not allowed to act as a student." 
00269         if (defined param $r "act_as_user" and not $authz->hasPermissions($userID, "become_student"));
00270     push @error, "You are not allowed to modify homework sets." 
00271         if ((defined param $r "edit_sets" or defined param $r "edit_set_for_users") and not $authz->hasPermissions($userID, "modify_problem_sets"));
00272     push @error, "You are not allowed to assign homework sets."
00273         if ((defined param $r "sets_assigned_to_user" or defined param $r "users_assigned_to_set") and not $authz->hasPermissions($userID, "assign_problem_sets"));
00274     push @error, "You are not allowed to modify student data."
00275         if ((defined param $r "edit_users" or defined param $r "user_options" or defined param $r "user_options") and not $authz->hasPermissions($userID, "modify_student_data"));
00276     push @error, "You are not allowed to score sets."
00277         if (defined param $r "score_sets" and not $authz->hasPermissions($userID, "score_sets"));
00278     
00279     # handle errors, redirect to target page
00280     if (@error) {
00281         $self->addbadmessage(CGI::p(join(CGI::br(),@error)));
00282 
00283     } elsif ($module) {
00284         my $page = $urlpath->newFromModule($module, $r, %args);
00285         my $url = $self->systemLink($page, params => \%params);
00286         $self->reply_with_redirect($url);
00287     }
00288 }
00289 
00290 sub body {
00291     my ($self) = @_;
00292     my $r = $self->r;
00293     my $db = $r->db;
00294     my $ce = $r->ce;
00295     my $authz = $r->authz;
00296     my $courseName = $self->{courseName};
00297     my $user = $r->param("user");
00298     
00299     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, "You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")
00300         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00301     
00302     print CGI::p({},"Use the interface below to quickly access commonly-used
00303     instructor tools, or select a tool from the list to the left.", CGI::br(),
00304     "Select user(s) and/or set(s) below and click the action button
00305     of your choice.");
00306     
00307     # DBFIXME shouldn't need to use list of IDs, use iterator for results, marks edits in WHERE clause
00308     # the grep here prevents set-level proctors from being displayed here
00309     my @userIDs = grep {$_ !~ /^set_id:/} $db->listUsers;
00310     my @Users = $db->getUsers(@userIDs);
00311 
00312 ## Mark's Edits for filtering
00313     my @myUsers;
00314     
00315     my (@viewable_sections,@viewable_recitations);
00316     
00317     if (defined @{$ce->{viewable_sections}->{$user}})
00318         {@viewable_sections = @{$ce->{viewable_sections}->{$user}};}
00319     if (defined @{$ce->{viewable_recitations}->{$user}})
00320         {@viewable_recitations = @{$ce->{viewable_recitations}->{$user}};}
00321 
00322     if (@viewable_sections or @viewable_recitations){
00323         foreach my $student (@Users){
00324             my $keep = 0;
00325             foreach my $sec (@viewable_sections){
00326                 if ($student->section() eq $sec){$keep = 1;}
00327             }
00328             foreach my $rec (@viewable_recitations){
00329                 if ($student->recitation() eq $rec){$keep = 1;}
00330             }
00331             if ($keep) {push @myUsers, $student;}
00332         }
00333         @Users = @myUsers;
00334     }
00335 ## End Mark's Edits
00336 
00337     # DBFIXME shouldn't need to use list of IDs, use iterator for results
00338     my @globalSetIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00339     my @GlobalSets = $db->getGlobalSets(@globalSetIDs);
00340     
00341     my @selected_users = $r->param("selected_users");
00342     my @selected_sets = $r->param("selected_sets");
00343     
00344     my $scrolling_user_list = scrollingRecordList({
00345             name => "selected_users",
00346             request => $r,
00347             default_sort => "lnfn",
00348             default_format => "lnfn_uid",
00349             default_filters => ["all"],
00350             size => 10,
00351             multiple => 1,
00352         }, @Users);
00353     
00354     my $scrolling_set_list = scrollingRecordList({
00355         name => "selected_sets",
00356         request => $r,
00357         default_sort => "set_id",
00358         default_format => "sid",
00359         default_filters => ["all"],
00360         size => 10,
00361         multiple => 1,
00362     }, @GlobalSets);
00363     
00364     print CGI::start_form({method=>"get", action=>$r->uri()});
00365     print $self->hidden_authen_fields();
00366     
00367     print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00368         CGI::Tr({},
00369             CGI::th("Users"),
00370             CGI::th("Sets"),
00371         ),
00372         CGI::Tr({},
00373             CGI::td({style=>"width:50%"}, $scrolling_user_list),
00374             CGI::td({style=>"width:50%"}, $scrolling_set_list),
00375         ),
00376         CGI::Tr({class=>"ButtonRow"}, [
00377             CGI::td([
00378                 CGI::submit(-name=>"sets_assigned_to_user", -label=>"View/edit")." all sets for one <b>user</b>(set dates, scores)",
00379                 CGI::submit(-name=>"users_assigned_to_set", -label=>"View/edit")." all users for one <b>set</b>",
00380             ]),
00381             CGI::td([
00382                 CGI::submit(-name=>"edit_users", -label=>"Edit"). " class list data for selected <b>users</b>",
00383                 CGI::submit(-name=>"edit_sets", -label=>"Edit"). " one <b>set</b>" . "&nbsp; &nbsp; ".
00384                 "or &nbsp; ".CGI::submit(-name=>"prob_lib",-label=>"add problems")." to one <b>set</b>",
00385             ]),
00386             CGI::td([
00387                 CGI::submit(-name=>"user_stats", -label=>"Statistics")." or ".
00388                 CGI::submit(-name=>"user_progress", -label=>"progress")." for one <b>user</b>",
00389                 CGI::submit(-name=>"set_stats", -label=>"Statistics")." or ".
00390                 CGI::submit(-name=>"set_progress", -label=>"progress")." for one <b>set</b>",
00391             ]),
00392             CGI::td([
00393                 CGI::submit(-name=>"user_options", -label=>"Change password")." for one <b>user</b>",
00394                 CGI::submit(-name=>"score_sets", -label=>"Score"). " selected <b>sets</b>",
00395             ]),
00396             CGI::td([
00397                 CGI::submit(-name=>"add_users", -label=>"Add")." new users",
00398                 CGI::submit(-name=>"create_set", -label=>"Create"). " new set: ".
00399                    CGI::textfield(-name=>"new_set_name", 
00400                        -default=>"Name for new set here",
00401                        -override=>1, -size=>20),
00402                 ]),
00403         ]),
00404         CGI::Tr({class=>"ButtonRowCenter"},
00405             CGI::td({-colspan=>2, align=>"center"},
00406                 CGI::table({-border=>0, align=>"center"},
00407                     CGI::Tr({-align=>"left"}, [
00408                         CGI::td({-height=>2}),
00409                         CGI::td(CGI::submit(-name=>"assign_users", -label=>"Assign")." selected <b>users</b> to selected <b>sets</b>"),
00410                         CGI::td(CGI::submit(-name=>"act_as_user", -label=>"Act as")." one <b>user</b> (on one <b>set</b>)"),
00411                         CGI::td(CGI::submit(-name=>"edit_set_for_users", -label=>"Edit"). " one <b>set</b> for  <b>users</b>"),
00412                         CGI::td({-height=>4}),
00413                         CGI::td(CGI::submit(-name=>"email_users", -label=>"Email"). " your students"),
00414                         ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "manage_course_files")
00415                             ? CGI::td(CGI::submit(-name=>"transfer_files", -label=>"Transfer"). " course files")
00416                             : ()
00417                         ),
00418                     ])
00419                 )
00420             )
00421         ),
00422     );
00423     
00424     print CGI::end_form();
00425     
00426     return "";
00427 }
